item.title: Individualized Athlete Monitoring in R, Part 1
item.description: Getting Back into the Swing of Things Statistical Process Control (SPC) Performing SPC in R Getting Fancy Wrapping Up Code Recap References Getting Back into the Swing of Things Well, it’s been a hot minute since my last post (whoops!). I’ve been busy with bobsledders and job hunting this summer, but I’ve finally found a bit of time to get back to the ole blog now that bobsled’s summer training is winding down and I’m preparing for an intercontinental move (keep an eye on Twitter for related news).
